article_title: Rockets and gunfire shortly before ceasefire expired.
sentence: The  Hamas  attacks  on  Israel  on  7  October  killed  1,200  people.

article_title: Rockets and gunfire shortly before ceasefire expired.
sentence: Since  then,  Gaza's  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says  more  than  14,800  people  have  been  killed  in  Israel's  retaliatory  campaign,  including  about  6,000  children.
